speak.voice: Welcome to DP600, the podcast where we dive deep into the world of analytics solutions using Microsoft Fabric. I'm your host, Brian, and today we have a very special guest with us. Please welcome Emma!
Hi Brian, thanks for having me on the show.
It's great to have you here, Emma. Before we get started, could you please introduce yourself to our listeners?
Of course, Brian. My name is Emma and I work for Contoso. I have extensive experience in implementing analytics solutions using Microsoft Fabric.

That's fantastic, Emma. Today, we're going to be discussing the topic of implementing analytics solutions using Microsoft Fabric. It's a fascinating subject and I'm really excited to learn more about it. So, let's dive right in!
Absolutely, Brian. I'm here to share my knowledge and help you understand how to seamlessly ingest data into your Fabric lakehouse using the ETL process and Fabric notebooks.
That sounds great, Emma. I'm sure our listeners are eager to learn more about this. So, without further ado, let's get started!
